topic.title: kxoid.bit
topic.body: Does it work for anyone in here?

1563139677_1CKTRBy9N4RvE3FgeZJpQqFYtLHc3.body: The most based poster in all of 0net, thank you for bringing strong opinions to the table.

1563165879_1CkgQwxBBdNTPhA4MjpNJsgQLbP5i.body:
Yes, that is the zite.
I mean, it loads but it's just a blank page for me. I wondered if it doesn't display anything just for me.

1563726596_1CKTRBy9N4RvE3FgeZJpQqFYtLHc3.body: Your posts are great but eventually will be shoved down in the 0talk list, so why don't you create your blog?
